name: Tension Ball
description:
Tension Ball is the product of my Physics final project.

Swing a ball according to your chosen pivot point. View essential physics statistics on the right. Complete ten normal levels and one challenge level.

--

This game is optimized for desktop (with a mouse). There is also an APK file for Android that can be run as well (be sure to enable install from unknown sources first).

Gabrian Chua
